title: Create A New Role Before Viri Closes The Channel Any% Speedrun

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Immediately reopen <#970046125065265202> for this phase.
- Immediately cause all actions that would've taken place at the end of the phase to occur immediately. Any other actions sent during this phase will process immediately.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Viri can cope seethe and mald

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose.
